- Set default savegame storage location to correct path to import from v2. If your v2 saves didn't come over, you can change the storage directory in the settings menu from `<Document>/Pdx-Unlimiter/storage` to `<Document>/Pdx-Unlimiter/savegames`
- Bump Ironman melter to latest versions for all games
- Improve some misleading settings options
- Fix various small errors
- Set max RAM usage to the same value as before

## Pdx-Unlimiter v3

The Pdx-Unlimiter got a complete rework in version 3.0. On the technical side, it is a completely new desktop application. On the game/save logic side, it stayed the same, meaning that all game integrations should work as before.

![](https://github.com/crschnick/pdx_unlimiter/blob/master/misc/eu5_screenshot.png?raw=true)

### New features

- Support for EU5
- Fixes for CK3 1.18+
- Fixes for VIC3 1.10+
- A completely overhauled UI
- Support for light/dark mode
- Many more new appearance and applications behaviour settings
- Signed Windows releases, meaning no more SmartScreen popup
- An improved desktop icon
- Faster startup times and improved memory usage
- Support to run it in the system tray/background
- Better scaling for hdpi displays
- Proper launching and updating on Windows when pinning the executable to the taskbar
- Properly working file associations, without confusing various browsers thinking that pdxu can open zip files

### Feedback

Please report any issues you encounter. There is a built-in issue reporter in the sidebar on the bottom. Alternatively, you can post your issue on GitHub or Discord. Due to the large rework, there will probably a few unexpected issues at first. But those should be fixed quickly.
